verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6817"\w* \w together|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w unto|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, \w Wherefore|strong="H4069"\w* passedst \w thou|strong="H3212"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* didst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w thee|strong="H3212"\w*? \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w thy|strong="H5674"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* fire.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w and|strong="H1568"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w with|strong="H3898"\w* Ephraim; \w and|strong="H1568"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* Ephraim, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* said, Ye are \w fugitives|strong="H6412"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* Ephraim, ye \w Gileadites|strong="H1568"\w*, \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* Ephraim, \add and\add* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1568"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gileadites|strong="H1568"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fords|strong="H4569"\w* \w of|strong="H4569"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* against \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Ephraimites. \w And|strong="H1568"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \add any of\add* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fugitives|strong="H6412"\w* \w of|strong="H4569"\w* Ephraim said, \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H5674"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* men \w of|strong="H4569"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* said \w unto|strong="H5674"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w*, \w Art|strong="H1961"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* Ephraimite? \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said, \w Nay|strong="H3808"\w*;

\w then|strong="H1696"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Say|strong="H1696"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w Shibboleth|strong="H7641"\w*; \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w Sibboleth|strong="H5451"\w*; \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w could|strong="H3559"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w frame|strong="H3559"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w pronounce|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w right|strong="H3559"\w*: \w then|strong="H1696"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* laid hold \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w at|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H7819"\w* \w fords|strong="H4569"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H7819"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*. \w And|strong="H8147"\w* there \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w at|strong="H3383"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* Ephraim forty \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* thousand.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3478"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w Gileadite|strong="H1569"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \add one of\add* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3478"\w* after him \w Ibzan|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w brought|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.
\w And|strong="H4191"\w* Ibzan \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w after|strong="H8141"\w* him Elon \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w Zebulunite|strong="H2075"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.
